books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the attempted assassination of President Reagan in 1981.
books.name: KILLING REAGAN

books.author: by Mindy Kaling
books.description: More personal essays from the comedian and actress.
books.name: WHY NOT ME?

books.author: by Jenny Lawson
books.description: A humorous treatment of the author’s experience of depression and anxiety disorder.
books.name: FURIOUSLY HAPPY

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America as well as a personal story by the national correspondent of The Atlantic, framed as a letter to his teenage son.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Bill Bryson
books.description: A journey to rediscover America by trekking the 2,100 miles of the Appalachian Trail. First published in 1998; now a movie.
books.name: A WALK IN THE WOODS

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The story of the bicycle mechanics from Ohio who ushered in the age of flight.
books.name: THE WRIGHT BROTHERS

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Rochus Misch and others
books.description: An account of Hitler's private life by a soldier who was part of his SS bodyguard, and died in 2013.
books.name: HITLER'S LAST WITNESS

books.author: by Jay Winik
books.description: A pivotal year that saw D-Day, the liberation of Paris, Franklin Roosevelt’s re-election and the Battle of the Bulge.

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by Aziz Ansari with Eric Klinenberg
books.description: The comedian enlists a sociologist to help him understand today’s dating scene.
books.name: MODERN ROMANCE

books.author: by Dick Lehr and Gerald O'Neill
books.description: The consequences of the Boston F.B.I.'s protection of James (Whitey) Bulger, the head of the Irish mob. Originally published in 2000; now a movie.
books.name: BLACK MASS

books.author: by Suzy Favor Hamilton with Sarah Tomlinson
books.description: Bipolar disorder drove a former Olympic runner to become a high-priced Las Vegas escort until she received treatment.
books.name: FAST GIRL

books.author: by Glenn Beck
books.description: The talk-radio host looks to Muslim teachings for the roots of Islamic extremism.
books.name: IT IS ABOUT ISLAM
